In my opinion, the first Open Season was the best! I have 4 kids (1,3,8,16), and this movie couldn't keep any of their attention. (not usually a hard thing to do while they are board on summer vacation and it is raining out..)

My nephew and I love this series so once I saw this we had to get it. Its not as strong as the first two movies ,but it is fun in its own way. Lots of butt jokes and a few past characters come back,and of course it had the typical open season shenanigans . Id recommend it as more of a rental unless you're a big enough fan to take the chance and buy it outright like we did

My little brother wanted to watch a movie with me, and looking through the movies list we found Open Season: Scared Silly. This was a great choice and I would recommend this for anyone. There is plenty of humor. I saw my little brother crying from laughter, which happened for the first time. This movie would most be enjoyed by kids around age 9. I myself enjoyed the movie I thought I would get bored, but I thought wrong.

I very much enjoyed this new edition to the Open Season movies. I loved the other three as well.

I liked that this particular movie had to deal with a scary legend of the werewolf. It was so much fun. We had to deal with Shawn getting Open Season "open" again so he would hunt the alleged werewolf. The movie is filled with hijinks as usual and some real gross parts dealing with poo!!!!

There were a few things I didn't care for but that happens in a movie. I think if you loved the other movies you will love this one too :-)

The only other thing is they didn't have Elliots kids in it. I might have missed something but that was a little strange. Either way, I enjoyed it!
Not as good as 1st one, but somewhat funny

After about 10 minutes even my children were talking about how annoying the constant barrage  of gab from the characters became. It had some funny one liners but overall the machine gun speed of jokes became less and less funny.
Did not keep my children's attention at all like the previous Open Season movies.
Cute but doesn't have the pizazz of the original movie nor the voices.  6 year old liked it though so 3 stars for that.

Really cute movie, the whole family can watch. Boog and Elliot are back in an all-new fun-tastic adventure! When Elliot tells a campfire story of a monster in the woods, Boog  who has never been the bravest of bears  becomes very scared. His best friend Elliot comes up with a crazy plan to scare the fear out of Boog! With the help of Mr. Weenie, McSquizzy and all your favorite forest friends, they venture on a hilarious journey where the power of friendship helps Boog overcome his fears with lots of laughs and some surprises along the way! One of the funniest movies I've seen in a while  It is packed with action and you never know what's happening next. Definitely the best of the Open Season series of movies.
My whole family loved it!

Let's face it, I'm a sucker for a cartoon and really terrific characters. Here we have both of those things. Boog and Elliot are the  centerpieces of another terrific adventure that had me laughing and having a great time. I whole-heartedly recommend all the Open Season movies to young and older alike.
